Title: The Vyshnoye Buck
Descriptions:
Howdy, Partner! Great work!

Alright, now let's get down to business: I need you to track down a special deer; a legend ‘round these parts: The Vyshnoye Buck. He's eluded Greg and I for near a decade, but I've got a good feelin’ ‘bout you, Partner.

He's usually spotted to the West or North West of Vyshnoye.

Bring me his pelt and I'll pay you ₽3000.

Remember to take plenty of bolts for your crossbow and attach chicken feathers to ‘em for better accuracy.

Straight shots, Partner!

Travel to Vyshnoye
Acquire pristine buck pelt

Travel to Vyshnoye
Acquire pristine buck pelt
ObjectiveText: Travel to Vyshnoye and bag The Legendary Vyshnoye Buck’s pelt in pristine condition
